## Foundation Funding Opportunities
###  [Data Visualization of Structural Racism and Place](https://www.rwjf.org/en/grants/active-funding-opportunities/2023/data-visualization-of-structural-racism-and-place.html)
* Supports the creation of data visualizations as tools to provide an understanding of structural racism's impact on place, health, and wellbeing.
* Deadline: June 2, 2023
* Award: Typically \$100-250K for one year

## Additional Funding Opportunity Resources
* [ProQuest Pivot listing of funding opportunities related to data science](https://pivot.proquest.com//funding/results?s_id=2660468) requires registration and login through the University of Utah.
